channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone has dumped two mattressses, 23rd June
item.description:
Dear team, Someone has dumped two mattresses on the corner of Wricklemarsh Road and Farjeon Road SE3 8DN. We would appreciate their removal as we don't want others to believe this is acceptable behaviour. Yours sincerely. Professor William Henry, Resident (224 Wricklemarsh Road)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 208, Wricklemarsh Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped black bin bags, 23rd June
item.description:
Black bin bags have been dumped on street next to bin. They have now opened up and spreading contents onto the street and road. They need removal and the waste cleaned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Crescent Road, Plumstead, London
